verses.verse: When <S%G2532><s%> the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was past, <S%G1230><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mother of James, <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Salome, <S%G4539><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> spices, <S%G759><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might come <S%G2064><s%> and anoint <S%G218><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Very <S%G3029><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> on the first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> when the sun <S%G2246><s%> had risen. <S%G393><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> will roll <S%G617><s%> away <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the tomb <S%G3419><s%> for us? <S%G2254><s%>"
for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> very <S%G4970><s%> big. <S%G3173><s%> Looking <S%G308><s%> up, <S%G308><s%> they saw that <S%G3754><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> was rolled back. <S%G617><s%>

Entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> a young man <S%G3495><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right side, <S%G1188><s%> dressed <S%G4016><s%> in a <S%G4749><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> robe, <S%G4749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were amazed. <S%G1568><s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1568><s%> amazed. <S%G1568><s%> You seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene, <S%G3479><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has been crucified. <S%G4717><s%> He has risen. <S%G1453><s%> He is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here. <S%G5602><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> go, <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> <S%G3754><s%> 'He goes before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> you will see <S%G3700><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>'"

They <S%G2532><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G5035><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846><s%> trembling <S%G5156><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> astonishment <S%G1611><s%> had come on them. <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> said nothing <S%G3762><s%> to anyone; <S%G3762><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

Now when <S%G1161><s%> he had risen <S%G450><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> on the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> he appeared <S%G5316><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> from <S%G575><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had cast <S%G1544><s%> out seven <S%G2033><s%> demons. <S%G1140><s%>
She went <S%G4198><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> those who <S%G1565><s%> had been <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> as they mourned <S%G3996><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wept. <S%G2799><s%>

When they <S%G2548><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was alive, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had been seen <S%G2300><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> they disbelieved. <S%G569><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things he was revealed <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> form <S%G3444><s%> to two <S%G1417><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> as they walked, <S%G4043><s%> on their way <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country. <S%G68><s%>
They <S%G2548><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away and told <S%G518><s%> it to the rest. <S%G3062><s%> They <S%G4100><s%> didn't <S%G1565><s%> believe them, either. <S%G3761><s%>

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> he was revealed <S%G5319><s%> to the eleven <S%G1733><s%> themselves as they <S%G846><s%> sat at the table, <S%G345><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he rebuked <S%G3679><s%> them for their <S%G846><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hardness of heart, <S%G4641><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they didn't <S%G3756><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> had seen <S%G2300><s%> him <S%G846><s%> after he had risen. <S%G1453><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> to the whole <S%G3956><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%>

He <S%G3588><s%> who believes <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is baptized <S%G907><s%> will be saved; <S%G4982><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who disbelieves <S%G569><s%> will be condemned. <S%G2632><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> will accompany <S%G3877><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who believe: <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> they will cast out <S%G1544><s%> demons; <S%G1140><s%> they will speak <S%G2980><s%> with new <S%G2537><s%> languages; <S%G1100><s%>

they will take up <S%G142><s%> serpents; <S%G3789><s%> and if <S%G2579><s%> they drink <S%G4095><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> deadly <S%G2286><s%> thing, <S%G5100><s%> it will in no <S%G3364><s%> way hurt <S%G984><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> they will lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sick, <S%G732><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they will <S%G2192><s%> recover. <S%G2573><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G3303><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> he had spoken <S%G2980><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> was received up <S%G353><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down at <S%G1537><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

They <S%G1565><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and preached <S%G2784><s%> everywhere, <S%G3837><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> working with <S%G4903><s%> them, <S%G2532><s%> and confirming <S%G950><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> that followed. <S%G1872><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
